remarks: Domain and codomain of the mapping operation; deduction form. (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2014.)
statement:
fmpt2d.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
fmpt2d.1 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> B ) ) $.
fmpt2d.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. A ) -> ( F ` y ) e. C ) $.
fmpt2d $p |- ( ph -> F : A --> C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
$d C y $.
$d F y $.
$d ph x $.
$d ph y $.
